case.title: Will you let me paint your nails, serve u drinks and help u get ready? - 28 (Will travel anywhere in London)
case.text: Thanks for reading. I posted a couple of months back and met a woman who was lovely but just too nice and didn't use me enough. Basically I am looking for a woman who wants a slave to use when she is getting ready to go out on the town. I will do anything you ask of me. I can paint your nails, serve you drinks etc as you get ready, iron your clothes and anything else you desire. I can even be your free taxi and will be on hand at any hour if you need a lift home. I am genuine and ideally looking for a long term arrangement. Would be honoured to hear from you, please tell me your age and a bit about you. Happy to serve groups of friends if you prefer.
